snippet: In two developments on Friday, the wrestlers apologized for their lewd and racist text messages, and the university announced their punishment....
lead_paragraph: In two developments on Friday, the wrestlers apologized for their lewd and racist text messages, and the university announced their punishment.

headline.main: Columbia Disciplines Wrestlers and Clears Team to Return to Competition
headline.print_headline: After Texting Scandal, Columbia Allows Some Wrestlers to Return
